snippet: A federal judge will retire following an investigation into an e-mail he forwarded that included a joke about bestiality and President Obama’s mother.
abstract: Federal District Court Judge Richard Cebull of Montana will retire following an investigation into an e-mail he forwarded that included a joke about bestiality and President Obama’s mother.
lead_paragraph: A federal judge will retire following an investigation into an e-mail he forwarded that included a joke about bestiality and President Obama’s mother.

headline.main: Montana: Judge Who Spread Racist Joke Retires
headline.print_headline: Montana: Judge Who Spread Racist Joke Retires
